w:r.w:t: Functional Requirements Specification (FRS) + Product Requirements Document (PRD)

requires a software platform to manage the lifecycle of solar installation projects from inquiry → quotation → compliance documentation → execution → closure. Current workflows rely on Excel, manual documents, WhatsApp, and email. This causes version confusion, delays, compliance risk, and operational inefficiency.
The proposed system centralizes quotation management, document generation, execution tracking, and client-facing deliverables, while enforcing structured workflows and reducing manual rework.
Provide clients with token-based document access
Installation phase execution asset capture (serial nos.)
No file size limits for media
View-only via token link, no login
Capture customer inquiries with site media & details
Edit margin % per item OR globally
End-to-end flow runs without external tools
Client receives closure pack via token link
No feature requires WhatsApp decision to proceed
Quotation PDF prints correctly with provided template
This FRS/PRD defines a complete linear solar execution workflow system suitable for production implementation by a competent dev team. There are no ambiguous signals, undefined
still screw this up, you need new
